reviews.review:
サイコパスと4人のサバイバーのイチャラブゲー（）

サイコパス側は4人のサバイバーを全員殺せば勝ち。
サバイバー側は発電機を修理し脱出できれば勝ち。

どちらも一番重要なのは音だ。
カラスの羽ばたく音や、修理のときにでてくるタイミングよくスペースキーを押す作業を失敗するとサイコパスに位置がばれる。
カラスはしゃがんでゆっくり歩けば大丈夫。修理はどこかでサイコパスが誰かといちゃついているのを祈りましょう^q^
また時には仲間を見捨てることも重要です...

またサバイバー側はサイコパスが近づくと心音がする。サイコパス側はサバイバーが通った足音がうっすら見える。
サバイバーは近づいてくるのがわかったら身を隠すか、逃げるか所々にある木箱に隠れるかを選択しなければならない。
ちなみにサイコパスは連続で攻撃できないけどサバイバーよりも早い。よく考えよう。

ゲーム性としてはなかなかいいが難点としては
①ゲーム中チャットができない。つまり連携は取れない。まぁ暴言とかが表示されないのはいいと思うが...
②フレンドを誘ってチームを組めない。プライベートマッチがあるが2人なら１VS１みたいになる。
③チュートリアルが実質無いに等しい。なくても分かるレベルだが、チュートリアルやっとかないと不安...という人もいるだろう点から

ただ今後のアップデートは無料で行う予定らしいので、これが改善されればもっといいゲームになるのではないかと思う。
ちなみに脳筋思考の私はサバイバー苦戦しました^q^

Really love the heartless teammates who dont care to save you

First of all: I Love this game!
It's so much fun to play and the atmosphere is amazing
yet I have 3 points that might need some rework:

- The beartrap-killer is able to place traps directly beneath the hook while a survivor is on the hook making it impossible to save him because one of the survivors always gets stuck in the bear trap if they try to rescue each other. Maybe just change it so the killer is able to place traps near the hooks but not underneath them.

- Playing with your friends is obviously the most fun but if you're just 2 or 3 people it's almost impossible to play together as survivors. So adding either a server browser or the option to create a lobby for your friends to  join together as survivors would be GREAT!

- I sometimes have issues with my internet connection so from time to time it occurs that my connection breaks for just a second or two but that's enough time to throw me out of the lobby and there is no option to join back in which leaves not just me but my fellow survivors pissed.

I really hope the developers read my review and maybe even think about adding one or two of my ideas because in my opinion those would make the game even more fun than it already is right now!

Please keep up the great work. I love your game and hope it will get some more content as i wish to be able to play it for as long as possible without it getting boring.

-ButterFliege33

I'm giving Dead By Daylight a positive review because I love it. I'm a huge horror buff and a total fanboy. The gameplay is a blast and the blood web levelling system is cool and addictive.

EDIT: I've updated the review, as most of my original complaints have been dealt with since the game was first released.

DbD has come a long way. Tons of new content, the developers are very active, reasonable DLC pricing. 

To make a long story short, it's a lot of fun UNTIL you decide to take it too seriously. If you plan to chase rank and be ultra competitive, you may start to see balance and design issues, not to mention intense player toxicity. On the other hand, if you just want to have a good time, if you're not concerned with pips and ranks, you'll likely enjoy DbD a lot.

how to get -rep comment on your steam profile

step 1: buy this game
step 2: select killer
step 3: find a survivor 
step 4: chase him down no matter what
step 5: kill him and hook him
step 6: stare at him until he dies and dont let any one save him
step 7: you now have a -rep comment on your steam profile
step 8: enjoy :)

Тут многие обзоры начали делать, поэтому и я решил сделать...
игра делится на две части. Можно взять жертву и пытаться выжить, что сделать ох как не просто, а можно взять маньяка и играть по фану ни о чём не беспокоясь. Объясню как( ибо в игре туториал скучный и нихуя толком не объясняет) 
жертва.
В этой игре вам как жертве надо включить все генераторы (что просто при наличии глаз и реакции), открыть дверь и сбежать. мешать вам будет маньяк, и его примочки. Если же он вас найдёт, то надо убегать, перепрыгивать через окна, вилять, прятаться в шкафу и кидать перед ним баррикады). Если тебя поймали, то тебе надо дёргаться чтобы выпасть у него и рук, или можно просто ждать смерти или чтобы тебя спасли. Спасать приходится с крюка жертвоприношения (вроде как, сам хз чё там происходит)  спасение очень простое (подошёл, снял, убежал), но усложняется обычно ждущим маньяком рядом. Так же можно поставить в начале предметы(фонарик, аптечка итд), усиления предметов, фишки карт (будет меньше крюков или больше баррикад которые можно скинуть итд) и перки (быстрее починка генератора, быстрее бег или быстрее лечение союзника итд). Иииииииииииии...Главное. при приближении маньяка у вас стучит сердце (у персонажа :D)

маньяк.
вам надо всех убить (да ладно))) и принести в жертву богу (-пауку чтоли?) на выбор даётся 3 вида маньяков.
 1-стандартный с капканом (лишает жертву возможности двигаться).
 2-пугало с колокольчиком (делает наполовину невидимым и  быстрым, но лишает возможности атаковать, имба крч). 
 3-кожаное лицо с бензопилой( при включении пилы замедляется, после включения начинает очень быстро бежать с бензопилой. но повороты будут только градусов на 20, также бензопила ложит с одного удара). При взрыве генератора (у жертвы отказали глаза или реакция) вам покажется какой генератор взорвался. Также покажется, какой генератор починили (отметится жёлтым цветом). Также проверяйте шкафы (чаще всего из них будут идти стоны, так что не потеряете). найдя жертву, вам надо повесить её на крюк и ждать, пока бог(-паук?) заберёт её, ибо её могут освободить. Правда со второго раза Жертва обычно умирает на крюке сразу. у маньяка, как и у жертв есть улучшение карт(больше крюков, меньше баррикад итд) улучшения скилла (быстрее заряжается бензопила или колокольчик, дольше снимается капкан итд) и перки (маньяк быстрее бьёт, бежит, ломает баррикады итд). вроде всё

основные плюсы и минусы.
+ атмосфера
+ геймплей
+ много маньяков
+ неплохая реализация
+- для хорора графон очень даже ничего, но для настолько хайпанутой игры он слабоват
- так себе оптимизация
- тимплея тоже нет, ибо чаще всего все жертвы огромный XYU ложили на него.
-  небольшой дисбаланс с очками крови (за маньяка их реально получить проще)
- сырость, как в дедушкином подвале
- WRAITH (поиграете-поймёте) 

а так игра на мой скромненький взгляд 7,5\10

P.s. на этом моя работа закончена)
(но ведь ты ничего не сделал)
 *медленно ухожу в закат* :D

Heyo!
Wie viele Andere wollte auch ich eigentlich ein positives Review schreiben, aber leider gibt es für mich zu viele entscheidende Probleme zur Zeit.
1. In der Beta hat das Balancing noch besser funktioniert als zu Release. (Von leichtem Vorteil für Surviver zu hartem Vorteil für Killer)
2. Das Rankingsystem funktioniert zur Zeit nicht. Selbst wenn man als Killer alle umbringt, kann man ein Downrank bekommen, wenn die anderen Spieler die Verbindung unterbrechen. Das führt mich auch gleich zum nächsten und wichtigsten Punkt:
3. Disconnects (unterbrochene Verbindungen) werden nicht bestraft, sie werden belohnt. Wer diconnectet verliert keinen Rang, keine Gegenstände, aber die zurückgelassenen Spieler den Spaß. Dies passiert leider VIEL zu oft. Kaum ein Spiel ohne Disconnects. :/

The game is great yeah its really fun and terrifying at the same time but the thing is that, 1. you cant invite your friends unless you create a private lobby, 2. you cant communicate with other players in game dont get me wrong i know what they are going for the whole random people put together in a place to survive and escape from the killer and well if they added the ingame chat there might be a slight problem when the killer lays a trap near the victim who has been hung for sacrifice if his friend tries to save him he might inform that there is a trap and let the other guy know well to fix this the victim must not be allowed to speak if he or she is captured that way the gameplay remains the same thats the only problem i have with this game at its current state.

Installed game

Went to Controls

... oh, can't customize the keybinds...

This game certainly has some issues. However, I do not believe that they are deal-breakers. This game is one of a kind, and I have already had much fun with it and the beta.

Dead by Daylight offre un modo originale per provare paura, soggezione e spesso il "cagarsi addosso". La grafica è curata ed è piuttosto ben ottimizzato (io ho 4GB di RAM su 8 richesti e ci gioco tranquillamente). Ovviamente non è esente da bug (molto divertenti a dire il vero) e il matchmaking non è che funzioni come dovrebbe, però è accettabile.
Se lo volete compratelo scontato, 20 euro sono un po' troppi... per ora. :D Questo gioco ha grandi potenzialità!

12 year olds leaving 24/7 ingame and in Lobbys
making this a 0/10

[h1][u]Opening with bad stuff[/u][/h1]

I really like this game and feel like it does not deserve all the hate, but it does deserve some of the hate. Let's talk about the hate it deserves. One of the few things that some people have complained about that I actually think is legit is the settings, like for a modern game 2k16 you would think that the devs would give you the option to change your settings for quality a little more than low , medium , high etc. I mean it does not really bother me but I think that it is an option that is needed. 
Another thing that needs to be addressed is the connection to steam, a lot of people have been dcd from the game because it says that steam is offline (myself included) but most of the time steam is still up. There is a lot more things that are legit to complain about but let's talk about the things that I really hate that people are complaining about. And that is the "You can't que with your friends" the thing is if you can que with your friends it will put the killer at a disadvantage but the devs have already said that they are working on it. And the whole que with friends, if you only want to que with friends and don't really care for other players then go play "Kill your friends" if you are only playing the game to be able to play with your friends does your rank/lvl really matter?

[h1][u]Good stuff[/u][/h1]

Now let's talk about the good things about the game. I've always liked the horror genre and was really excited when I saw this game. I just love the feeling as you run for your life hoping you will get away or that someone will distract the killer so you could survive. The game has a *v1 concept and the survivors need to turn on generators in order to escape while the killer will try to hinder them at any costs. I really love this concept, it both builds on teamwork and betrayal. I've had my fair deal of teammates trying to save me and my fair deal of teammates luring the killer to me or just blocking my path with wooden objects ;_;. 

[h1][u]Game stuff[/u][/h1]

The lobby layout is fairly simple, you click join lobby(sometimes a lot because you can't connect or something) then you wait for the whole lobby to fill out, in the meantime you change your loadout to make it easier for you to survive(med kits, flashlights, add-ons, sacrifices and perks) and check out the other teammates lvl/rank, it's a shame that you can't see the killers rank or level anywhere(well you can see his rank after the game is done but that isn't enough) and I think that is a shame because you would not know if you are meeting an experienced player or a completely beginner, so you can't really adapt your playstyle(You can kinda, it puts you with kind of the same rank but still). Then in game you start of fairly close to your teammates while the killer is pretty close himself so you could easily get caught within the first 10-20 seconds if you aren't careful. If you are caught the killer will most likely guard you while you are sitting on a hook and that will give your team two choices. Either 1, save you (Which will be the more risky choice and someone will most likely be killed instead of you or with you) or 2. Turn on the generators while you are struggling (This is the more obviously choice since you barely get any rewards saving your teammates which is a shame) after all the generators have been turned on you try to open the exit and escape, or if you are alone left you can find the escape hatch and ditch the others.

[h1][u]End[/u][/h1]

I really love the concept of being in an old horror movie and trying to survive but I think it would make the game better if they added some sort of VON/VOIP 3D broadcast to the game, it would benefit the survivors but the killer would be able to hear them as well.
Currently I would rate the game 7/10 just because of the missing things and some balancing issues.


[h1][u]UPDATE[/u][/h1]

Now that I have more hours into the game I feel like I can point out some more things.
The devs have added a mode called Survive with friends which is basically a mode that lets you play with your friends online and that is great, if it wasn't for the fact that you need to spend on average 30-40 minutes in the fricking lobby pressing "READY" over and over again. This is a shitty way of treating your "Customers" by letting them wait for hours only to have the host (aka the killer) leave and you will feel robbed of your time. 
They have also added a feature which gives killers points in case a survivor leaves, but not vice versa????? I mean like if the killer gets something if someone rage quits shouldn't the survivors get something if the killer rage quits?? 

I just want to say one thing after this fucked up development and that is the Developers are bloody stupid, like common why do they keep buffing killers all the time when it's not even needed....

I just feel like they don't even care about the fans but only about the money they have already gotten. 

Until they fix a lot of bugs (Did not mention the bugs) and still balancing issues then I can't recommend this game to people.
It is a really good game, I can only recommend it. Never seen a game like this before, it is fun to be the killer or the survivor as well.

An sich gutes Spiel wenn ich ENDLICH MIT MEINEN FREUNDEN IN EINE LOBBY KOMMEN WÜRDE!!!

Had to Edit my last review was wayy to long.
I love this game!
So i have been seeing a lot of people complaining about the wrath in the review section.
i must address the wrath first my favorite killer he is not OP! people just dont like the fact that when he cloaks they cant sense or find him when he is close! but thats the f*****g point of cloaking! Most killers when they are near will cause a players heart to beat faster depending on how far he is away but as the wraith can go nearly invisible, YES NEARLY he can still be seen. he doesn't set off the heartbeat warning but! he has to come out of cloak to attack which takes time and is very noisy giving plenty of time to run away! also flash lights are not pointless i have been blinded many times and lost entire groups of survivors due to its effect on my shitty retinas only face shots will stop the killer not body shots which many people do...

But now for the review/tips
- patience pays off in this game for survivors and killers! be patient, listen and scan your surroundings and you will succeed.
- screw barricade loopers (killers will know what i mean) i will catch you either way! also a great tactic for survivors to slow down the killer allowing more time for gens to be repaired.
- the basement is your friend as the killer providing you have the required perk. survivors will barely be able to escape your torture and their allies do not like attempting rescue form a room with one way in and out.
- stick together! repairing gens is amazingly faster when two people are working on it at once.
- crows will give you and the killer away if you cant see the wraith but are felling he is stalking you slowly move past crows or near them and if your to fast or he is they will be startled!
- amazing teamwork can be done or lone wolfing if your as sick as the killer i have saw a few survivors leave there friends to die or leading me to their friends to be killed instead of them.
- great progression in my opinion and leveling up your killer or survivor is soo satisfying.
- amazing ambiance and sound! form soot steps to tracking scratches left behind form survivors along the path they took leading you to them if your good at tracking it pays off! you will learn how.
i could go on forever! but its already getting to long!
JUST BUY IT  and hunt,track,plan,deceive and claim your victims for the entity or die trying to escape!

this game is amazing. the only problem with it at the moment is that you can't play with your friends (only private match) and  that trying to play as the killer takes litterally more than 30 mins, i still havnt played as one and i have 8 hrs of play. they need to fix this issue asap. Also the ranking system is almost as bad as Leauge of Legends where it takes 50yrs to rank up because you will lose your rank from dcing, laggy games, dying by lag or your team leaves/rage quits which makes you be alone and then you die to a killer which makes you lose your rank. Fix please

殺人鬼 vs サバイバーという1 vs 4人形式の非対称型対戦マルチプレイです。
ゲームモードは2つで、殺人鬼1人 vs サバイバー4人形式のランクマッチで、プレイでレベルアップやアイテム入手用の経験値を得られます。
もう一つは、フレンド同士でプレイ可能なプライベートマッチですが、経験値は入りません。

おどろおどろしいBGMと、殺人鬼から逃げる緊張感は新鮮で、サバイバー側でも殺人鬼側でも楽しめます。

これと同じコンセプトのとして“Friday The 13th: The Game”、“Last Year”が発売予定で、非対称型対戦マルチプレイとしては新しいジャンルのゲームと言えます。

ただ、不満点はいくつかあります。

[strike] ・現在のバージョン(V1.0)では、ランクマッチにフレンド同士のチームは参加出来ない。[/strike] 
・v1.03にて、フレンドサバイバーパーティーでランクマッチに参加できるようになりました！
・ゲーム中のチャットは禁止。ボイスチャットもテキストチャットも禁止されているため、ゲーム中にコミュニケーションをとる手段がない。

これらはフォーラムでも議論を呼んでいて、開発が修正するかどうかが待ち望まれています。

言い換えれば、今後のアップデート次第でメジャータイトルとなる可能性を秘めているゲームと言えます。
動画配信サイトのTwitchでも、ベータ版から視聴者数が上位に食い込む勢いをもっておリ、期待ができます。
игра хорошая все советую !

This game has come a very long way since launch. When I first puchased this game there was nearly no content. Three killers; Wraith, Trapper, Hillbilly and only four survivors. The game was incredibly unbalanced. From infinite loops to pallet vacuum. Now, there are 14 killers and 15 survivors. Most of the game breaking bugs are patched and they've released a cosmetic market.   

I most definitely recommend this game, and I believe they will continue releasing content until they release a sequel.

FInally a game wich get my adrenaline and my heart rate to 200%
Truly a awesome game if you love to hide, survive and trick killers as survivors or hunt, trap and slaugther as a bloodthirsty killer.
Kinda uniqe game where there are 4 survivors vs 1 killer i really love to play the survivors and the killer it gives a certain feeling from both in the gameplay. I really liked how the Devs diaries was so accurate towards the game, it showed that they really care about their creation that is Dead by daylight.
The feeling when you escape or when you caught the last survivor and hook him...it feels amazing (personally when i caught someone i start the music "Hooked on a feeling" cuz a badass killer need badass music)

Pros: You can hunt 4 victims, you have to think before you act as a survivor, gameplay is sweet and the heartbeat is epic!
Helping fellow survivors gives you more points and bigger chance to survive but also a penalty if you get caught by the killer!, can be 4 different survivors and 3 different killers. EPIC chases and escapes.
Have no DLC wich i hope they never get!

Cons: Can only play with friends in private, if not you are lucky to find them in a solo queue.
Killers tend to camp after they hooked 1 survivor, some bugs that break the game so that if not you or the killer leave the game goes on forever and the one who leaves loses points.

I really do hope that the devs fixes so you can play with friends in a public game and that they give us some different customisations for blood points or something, overall the game is awesome and i recomend it 100% but i would not buy it for 19,99 Euro it's worth 15,99 thats for sure but not higher.

10 сердцебиений из 10

Definitely worth buying. I bought it 2 weeks before release and I really don't regret it. Gameplay is fun and so tense I almost shat my pants a few times (especially when you fix the generator and you hear those fucking bell chimes and Wraith appears behind you). And this rising heartbeat sound.... It can be really scary sometimes :D I didn't experience such problems as other people describing in their reviews. I was disconnected from Steam once but it was my Internet connection. No crashes, no "failed to join lobby", no neverending loading screens. Very few occasional bugs/glitches, one round with lags. When creating a lobby as a killer, max amount I had to wait was ~3 mins. 

Pros:
- really intense gameplay
- great atmosphere
- deep progression system
- 3 killers to choose from
- nice locations and procedurally generated environment - no round will be the same
- graphics and sound quality
- feeling that you get when being chased by a killer !

Cons:
- no party system (yet)
- no in-game voice chat when playing with randoms
- no customizable controls
- only pre-defined graphic settings (for me it's not exactly a problem)
- killers camping by the hook (it is good and bad thing actually - you can't save your fellow player and unhook him but you have time to fix generators)

To conclude. for me it's very well made game, giving ton of fun, with great atmosphere and great progression system. No other game could get my heart beating so fast and so pumped with adrenaline. It has some flaws like lack of party system, but developers are working on it and it's their priority. And playing with randoms can be fun as well. I really recommend buying this game if you want to feel the thrill of hunting or being hunted.

Very good game to play with friends and even online. However, i do feel like players should be able to Que with eachother (as survivers into a random killer) This could make the game potentially more fun for people instead of struggling to get into the same game.

Just heard in the Twitch #6 that the "small" team size used as an excuse is actually 30 people! I guess let us eat cake.

Still Alpha...

Lack of key bindings, load times, lack of graphics options show this is running on a game engine not ready for release. 

There is no AI, so when the killer rage quits or someone goes AFK the game is nothing but a objective hunt to get out or a kill free for all.

The game lacks depth. In under two hours I did everything there was to do multiple times and only 1 person tried to save me. To be fair the later point could be due to the game balancing that allows the killer to simply sit at the hook until the player is dead then repeat on the next player.

The camera is really sluggish and poorly implemented (on purpose to help the killer?) so once the killer is close they got you unless they are really bad. Oh and quicktime events to interact with objects or climb through windows are flaky at best, likely a network code issue.

Has potential but don't all babies? Wait to see what this matures into. I'm guessing due to the poor launch the player base is going to fall quickly and this will be on sale during the Summer sale a few weeks from now to try to bolster the player base. 

There is no published roadmap of further development plans and given the number of missing features and bugs there should at least be a ETA on issues present since BETA. IF the publisher and dev haven't already cut their loses I expect DLC will be a priority because key bindings are engine programming 101 and that feature is missing so...

In parting, for every Alpha quality game you buy a developer that actually finished their work gets pushed to the sidelines. 

JUST SAY NO TO ALPHA :)

Ну что сказать, для начала пустим в ход реализацию. Самая идея очень неплохая, игр подобного жанра уже давно не видел, ну-с, где я там слыхал про Friday 13th The game, но всё же она ещё не вышла, и говорить мы будем про неё уже в дату выхода. В общем за реализацию идеи и воплощение страхов в виртуальный мир это плюсик. Медленно переходим к графике... Я здесь лично не могу придраться к чему либо, всё сделанно качественно, а главное добросовестно. За графику тоже небольшой плюсик рисуем. Оптимизация... На моём компьютере матчи проходят не так гладко, а игра иногда подлагивает, но всё же по сравнению с другими играми, эта хорошо оптимизирована. Тоже плюс. Карты... Хммм... Вот здесь есть свои буйки с порохом... Карт не так много как казалось бы, по факту мы чаще играем на разновидностях этих самых карт, вот за разновидность карты и рандомную генерацию похвала, за малое количество карт обидно. Но всё же я поставлю милипизерный плюс. Идём дальше... Минусов здесь хватает... Начнём с того, что анимация часто багует, и игра выглядит немного странно, за что складывается впечатление, что поторопились с этим моментом. Так же очень горько меня приветствовала загрузка, ну уж очень она долгая, есть с чем сравнить. Ну ещё я хотел отметить свою принадлежность к такому жанру игр, посути анигилируя в матче, создаётся волна настроения. Собственно забыл упомянуть метки, которые поставлены на превью игры в стиме. Атмосферность - несмоненно есть, дух захватывает от знания того, что где то рядом ходит маньяк, что бы грохнуть тебя за милую душу. Хоррор - ну тут говорить ничего не буду, оно само собой виднеется. В общем в результате моих некоторых наблюдений в течении часа, я сделал следующие выводы: 1. Немного поторопились; 2. Хорошая реализация; 3. Ощущение абстрактного присутствия чего либо после матча. Ну что сказать, рекомендую, деньги потратите не зря, это я вам точно говорю. Ну, а минусы совсем незначительные на фоне всего хорошего. Вот так как-то.

정말 재밌는 게임이라고 생각한다
생존자의 입장에서는
멀티플레이이면서 채팅, 음성채팅, 감정표현등 생존자간의 소통을 최대한 막아두었다는점,
생존자가 살인마를 공격할수없는, 이른바 막을수없는 존재를 적으로두어 공포심을 더욱 조성한다는점
이런점을통해 한여름밤에 즐기기 딱 좋은 수준의 공포게임이 되었다고 생각한다
살인마로 플레이할수 있다는점 역시 보통의 공포게임과는 다른 이 게임만의 특별한점이라고 생각한다
살인마로 플레이하는순간 이 게임은 공포게임이 아닌 인간사냥 시뮬레이터가 된다
필자는 누군가 쫓아오는 느낌을 싫어해 평소 공포게임을 즐기지않지만 살인마로 플레이할수 있다는점에 끌려 이 게임을 구매했다
까마귀가 날아가는소리나 발전기소리를통해 생존자의 위치를 추리하고 찾아내 술래잡기끝에 생존자에게 죽음을 선사하는 그 기분은 공포와는 또다른 의미에서 오싹한 전율을 선사해준다

단지 몇가지 아쉬운점이 있다면 생존자가 바리게이트를 타이밍맞춰 내릴경우 살인마가 거기에 맞아 행동이 잠시간 멈춘다는점과 생존자들의 협력을 잘해 플래시 일점사같은 기술로 살인마를 농락할때는 마치 스타크래프트1 유즈맵중 '약올리기'시리즈를 할때 술래의 기분이 된다는것이다.
또, 맵중 어떤곳에는 창문 두세개가 연달아 붙어있는지점이 있는데 생존자가 작정하고 농락하면 살인마로써 아무런 저항도 못하고 농락을 당할수밖에 없는것이다.
농락을 받기 싫다면? 그대로 빡종을 하던지, 농락하는 상대를 뛰어넘는 트릭으로 낚아 잡아 죽이던지, 아니면 눈앞의 먹잇감을두고 다른 먹이를 찾으러 가야할것이다.
물론 생존자는 도망자고, 살인마가 술래인데다가 한명만 죽여도 일단은 승리라는 문자를 볼수있는 살인마인만큼 생존자에게 여러 생존 테크닉이 존재하는건 옳다고 생각한다.
하지만 클로즈베타기간과 게임이 오픈한 오늘을 합쳐 그리 많은 시간이 지나지 않았음에도 이런저런 생존 테크닉으로 살인마를 농락하는것이 가능한 지금, 시간이 지나 유저들의 평균 실력이 오를경우 얼마나 더 생존자에게 유리한게임이 될지 걱정도 든다
물론 살인마 플레이어의 평균실력도 오르고, 이런저런 테크닉도 발견되겠지만 위와같은 생존자의 농락테크닉을 이기기 위해선
'생존자의 동선을 완벽히 예측해 덫을 놓는족족 누군가 밟을 정도의 트래퍼', '퇴로를 완벽히 한정시킨뒤 모습을 드러내 생존자를 독안에 든 쥐처럼 사냥하는 레이스', '전기톱에 시동을 걸때마다 한명씩 제물로 바칠실력의 차저..아니 힐블리.(힐블리의 전기톱은 맞추기 굉장히 어렵다고 생각한다. 돌진중 방향전환이 거의 되지않는데, 어떤 생존자가 직진으로만 달리겠는가? 엄폐물이라도 하나 끼고 도는순간 전기톱은 아무런 의미가 없어진다.)'
그렇다고 단순히 살인마를 상향시키거나 생존자를 너프시키면 될 문제는 아니기에 이런 문제가 어떻게 해결되어갈지 또한 기대되는점이다.

게임적인 부분은 이제 다 얘기했고, 아직 게임이 오픈한지 얼마 안되서인지 종종 버그가 보인다. 특히 살인마가 생존자를 들쳐메려할때 가끔 아무리 space를 눌러도 들쳐메지지 않는때가 있는것이다.
다른 생존자를 다운시킨뒤엔 그 생존자를 들쳐멜수있고, 그 다음엔 원래 누워있던 생존자까지 들쳐멜수 있으나 눈앞에 다운된 생존자가 있는데 다른 생존자를 잡으러가라니?

부정적인 이야기를 많이하긴 했지만, 이 게임을 사려고 고민중이라면 당장 지갑을 열고 구매하길 바란다.
혼자해도, 같이해도 정말 재밌는 게임이다.
플레이시간은 아직 3시간밖에 안되지만 적어도 여름동안만 백수십시간정도는 시간을 투자할 가치가 있다고 생각한다

Insanely fun

Dead by Daylight is ein ECHT tolles spiel mit gute Atmosphere. Es macht spaß es zu spielen und die grafik is wenn man keinen schlechten pc hat echt gut.Das Spiel ist recht ausgewogen also killer und auch als Überlebender und da ich Persönlich n Fan von Überleben / Horror games bin ein Daumen hoch und 8 von 10 Punkten, da hir und da mal komische bugs auftreten wie animations bugs oder halt glitches aber mir gefällts.
